data.What is the time duration at which the i: Your insurance cover begins with your seating on a Women Rider ride and continues until you reach the destination. The insurance can be claimed for a maximum of 24 hours.

data.What are the Terms & Conditions of the I: Insurance cover applies only to bookings made via the Women Rider platform. For full terms and conditions, see Insurance T&C.

data.How do I make a claim for insurance for: You can make a claim in case you are injured or met with an accident while traveling using the application under the head of Insurance

data.What safety features does women riders g: Emergency Response Team: Available 24/7 to address any emergency during the ride. Activate the SOS button via the app after booking a ride.

data.How does the SOS option work?: The SOS button connects you to the emergency response team for quick action. You can also share ride details with your trusted contacts.

data.How do I know how much a ride will cost?: Input your pickup and drop-off addresses in the app to get an estimate of the fare. Fare varies by location, time booked, and rider availability

data.How do I see a breakdown of the fare?: On the booking page, there is an icon next to the fare. The breakdown has Base Fare, Distance Fare, Ride Time Fare, Insurance Charges, Discounts, and Surcharges.

data.How do I use a coupon code for a ride?: Click Apply Coupon Code while booking a ride and see the applicable codes. Choose which one you want to apply and click Apply to make it active.

data.How do I contact my rider?: Once your ride is confirmed you can reach your rider through either chat or call within the app.

data.What are ETAs, and how is it calculated?: What are ETAs, and how is it calculated?

data.How do I start a ride with a PIN?: After the reservation, you will receive a PIN in the Track Ride area. Share this with your rider to start the ride.

data.What is Local Service?: A same-city parcel delivery service. It has restrictions as follows: item size, weight (under 5 kg), and contents (for instance, not containing alcohol, fragile or expensive items).

data.How to use the Local Service?: Tap the Local Service in the app menu > Enter pickup and drop-off details > Give the rider a PIN at both ends to confirm delivery.

data.How can I share the delivery status?: Use the Share Status option to send a tracking link and rider details to the recipient.

data.How do I book a ride?: Enter your destination, confirm the pickup location, and tap Request Ride. You'll receive a notification when your ride is confirmed.

data.How do I update my language preference?: Proceed to Menu > Settings > Language to change your preferred language

data.How do I update my favourite places?: Proceed to Menu > Settings > Favorites to view or edit your saved addresses like Home and Work.

data.Can I schedule a ride?: Not yet, though! Keep checking for that!

data.How do I refer a friend?: Use the Invite Friends option in the menu. Share your referral code with friends and earn rewards!.

data.How do I track my referral credits?: You can find your referral rewards under Invite Friends > Total Rewards. You can use these credits for future rides.

data.How do I link or unlink a wallet?: Navigate to Menu > Payment, tap on the wallet you wish to link or unlink and follow the on-screen instructions. Please note that the wallet must be registered with the same number as your Women Rider account.

data.How do I check my wallet balance?: You can access the wallet balance by visiting Menu > Payment.

data.What are Women Rider Coins?: Reward programme wherein you earn coins with every ride and offer. One coin is equivalent to 1 INR. You can use them with other discounts for booking.
